summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Endless Path multi-service platform. Backend APIs working with 89.5% success rate. Frontend loading correctly after fixing CSS syntax error. All core user flows functional for Customer, Provider, and Admin roles.

minor_bugs.impact: Customer profile page may not load properly

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized requests
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - different error code than expected

resolved_issues.issue: Fixed literal \n characters in index.css causing compilation errors

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section and navigation
Services page with search and filters
Registration form validation and role selection
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix customer profile endpoint (/api/auth/me) returning 404 error. Investigate token parsing in get_current_user function. Admin login redirection timing may need adjustment.
